title: unnatamAghiya
sahitya:
unnatamAghiya sannata vAkkidu Om samayOga orumai


anupallavi

  tannala serukkillai podu nala vIruDan mannuyir tannuyir enna madittiDum


caraNam    tAi enum dayavuDan shEi enam kuzhaivuDan sattiya vAkkuDan sAdhu sangattuDan
vAi manam uDalilE tUya nalloLiyuDan vAzhndiDa vaghai taru mantirat-tiran idu
